name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, after all the events of the Paris Olympics were over, the Chinese sports delegation said that China had won a phased victory in the fight against the United States against doping. Liu Guoyong, deputy head of the Chinese sports delegation to the Paris Olympics, said: Adhering to the right path, the Chinese sports delegation, under the five-ring flag, faced the extreme pressure from the United States, handled the trimetazidine incident of Chinese swimmers steadily and well, achieved a phased victory, and won the respect of the world with strength.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, the Indian delegation ended its Olympic journey with 1 silver and 5 bronze medals. The topic #India0goldmedals# became a hot topic that day, and many netizens left comments in the comment section to mock India.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In June this year, a netizen went to the Potala Palace in Lhasa to hold a flag and take a photo. He was questioned by the police and asked to explain what the slogan "I dream of true love and freedom" means and why he pursues these. The police said that it is not allowed to hold a flag in the Potala Palace, not even the party flag or the national flag, because it is easy to be "P-ed by those who support national independence", and registered the netizen.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 10, Al Jazeera host Mehdi Hassan and Gao Zhikai, former translator of Chinese leader Deng Xiaoping and deputy director of the China and Globalization Think Tank, had a heated debate on Xi Jinping's dictatorship, the disappearance of Chinese ministers and their suppression of dissidents, including human rights in Taiwan, Xinjiang, and Tibet. During the debate, Gao Zhikai's ugly behavior caused heated discussions on the Internet.
Video 1
Kuang Songqing: You said that China has freedom of speech. Do you dare to mention two mistakes that Xi Jinping has made?
Gao: China should solve the problem of aging....
Host: Do you think Xi Jinping should be held responsible for this?
Gao (quickly changed his words): This is the fault of the entire government...

Video 2
Host: Where is Qin Gang?
Gao: We face corruption without mercy
Host: Where is Qin Gang?
Gao: He is my old friend for 20 years
Host: Where is Qin Gang?
Gao: He was quickly dealt with
Host: Where is Qin Gang...
fullContent:
8月10日，半岛电视台主持人迈赫迪·哈桑与中国领导人邓小平的前翻译、中国与全球化智库副主任高志凯就习近平的独裁、中国的部长们的失踪及其对异见人士的打压，包括台湾，新疆，西藏的人权等问题展开了激烈的辩论，期间，高志凯因丑态频出引发网络热议。
视频1
邝颂晴：你说中国有言论自由，你敢说两个习近平犯过的错误吗？
高：中国应该解决老龄化问题....
主持人：你认为习近平应该为此负责？
高（赶紧改口）：这是整个政府的错误...

视频2
主持人：秦刚去哪儿了？
高：我们毫不留情面对腐败问题
主持人：秦刚去哪儿了？
高：他是我20年的老朋友
主持人：秦刚去哪儿了？
高：他被迅速处置了
主持人：秦刚去哪儿了？
高：你永远不会见到他。
主持人：很多人都失踪了
高：他们失踪我很开心。
主持人：你有一天会失踪吗?
高：到那一天你们记得救我....

视频3
主持人：你刚才说新疆人都是你的兄弟姐妹，那么到底有多少兄弟姐妹被关进了集中营？
高：我不知道具体数字
主持人：我们的数据是50万人。
高：这个数字不对。
主持人：为什么你知道这个数字不对，你知道有多少人？
高：我不知道。

视频4
主持人：习近平是独裁吗？
高：不是
主持人：但是选票上只有习近平的名字
高：当查尔斯继承了国王，选票上也只有一个名字
主持人：你问错人了，我支持废除君主制。
高：我非常清楚，你不能在英国反对君主制
主持人，我刚才就反对了，你敢在中国说这些吗？
高：你要了解中国的体制....

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The 2024 Paris Olympics came to an end. The United States and China both won 40 gold medals, but Chinese media and netizens also counted the gold medals of Taiwan and Hong Kong as the first place; among them, netizens went viral with a self-made gold medal list, claiming that it was the gold medal list officially announced by France.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 11, Linyi, Shandong. Someone in Tancheng was shot by an arrow and sent to the hospital. A police car was also shot by an arrow. 
Staff of the Linyi Public Security Bureau said that two people were shot by arrows and sent to the hospital. They were not in danger of life. The suspect has been arrested.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi had a phone call with Iranian Foreign Minister Ghairi. Wang Yi: China supports Iran in defending its sovereignty and security in accordance with the law. China firmly opposes and strongly condemns the assassination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 11, Bloomberg reported: China's net foreign direct investment withdrawal in the second quarter hit a record high.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 9, Guangdong. A high school student posted a video crying, "I didn't expect senior year to be so hard. I heard that every step for Chinese people is very critical. I feel like my life is over."

content: At the West Lake deliveryman protest, there was a violent scuffle between the deliveryman and the police on the scene.

content:

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Fully armed police forcibly drove away the delivery man, the two sides pushed each other, the delivery man sang the national anthem, and the police negotiated with the delivery man at the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hangzhou deliverymen's protests have achieved results
On the evening of August 12, a Hangzhou police station issued an internal notice to all property management companies, requiring them to avoid violent conflicts in the future when communicating with deliverymen, to treat them rationally and peacefully, to manage them humanely, and to strictly prohibit property security guards from fining deliverymen.
Prevent similar situations from happening again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen was live-streaming a deliveryman's rights protection, but the video suddenly stopped.
